title: How to Have a Sleepover on Animal Crossing

steps.headline: Meet up with or text your friends and tell them you're having an Animal Crossing sleepover at your town on whatever date.
steps.description: Tell them not to tell their parents that they're staying up late having a sleepover!

steps.headline: Stock up on items in-game like party poppers, roman candles, fireworks, party invites, fruit and turnips to eat, and a few beds to put in your house so there's somewhere for everyone to sleep during the week.
Make sure your town is "perfect" on the day.
steps.description: Pick all your weeds, get rid of garbage, put all the fruit and turnips outside or inside your house, and decorate. You could make paths, decorate with flowers, etc.

steps.headline: Get your DS fully charged and get your snacks ready before you go to bed.
steps.description: Text your friends so they remember to come, and tell them to select "go out" while you open your town gates.

steps.headline: Make sure your parents are in bed or in another room.
steps.description: Close the door. You might want headphones too.

parts.name: Making the Most of Your Sleepover

steps.headline: Give your friends a town tour, then the party starts!
Play a few games if it's a birthday, like musical chairs, tag, etc.
steps.description: You can play truth or dare and hide and seek.

steps.headline: Drop the fruit/turnips outside so your friends can pick them up and eat them.
Exchange gifts/non-native fruit.
steps.description: If you have a birthday cake, put it inside.

steps.headline: Sit and chat with your friends while you fish or catch bugs (at night) and just chill out.
Annoy the animals if they're still awake and talk to them.
Listen to KK Slider if it's a Saturday night.
Make everyone go to your house and sleep in the beds at midnight.
steps.description: Close your DS and go to sleep.

steps.headline: Wake your friends in the morning and turn the DD back on.
steps.description: Then you can have breakfast- fruit and coffee at Brewster's cafe. Maybe after you can check out the museum and get your friends to donate fossils, fish, bugs or paintings.

steps.headline: Shop till you drop at Able Sisters or Tom Nook's.
Lay out patterns on the beach as beach towels, put on your sunglasses and bathers (pattern) and get a tan (if it's summer)
Have a few more games and bug catching and then, say bye to your friends and let them leave your town.
Get on with your morning routine when your parents wake up.
